info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Saratoga County through 345 PM EDT... At 314 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Edinburg, or 16 miles northwest of Saratoga Springs, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rock City Falls, Mount Pleasant, West Day, Batchellerville, Fox Hill, Lake Desolation, Shaw Corners, Frink Corner, Hagedorns Mills, Sky Ranch, Barkersville, Glenwild, Fayville, Wiley Corners, Skinner Corners, Long Corners, East Galway, Green Corners, Chatfield Corner and Pages Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
